outputs.output_descr:
The main objective of the project is to support local councils, community leaders and NGOs representatives to enhance their capacities in monitoring public policies, advocating for pro poor policies, designing, implementing and monitoring MDG-based development  plans  and strategies at local level, and improving their capacities in project design, implementation and monitoring.

More specifically, the project has three main components: (i) support civil society organisations in the analysis,  monitoring and evaluation of public policies in general and most specifically, Government strategies and actions to attain the MDGs; (ii) support local authorities to elaborate MDG-based development plans strategies at community and council level, and develop tools for monitoring and evaluation; (iii) support civil society and local actors to design projects, in order to be able to access resources, particularly HIPC funds, and deliver.

project_title: MOVING AHEAD LOCALIZATION OF MDGs IN CAMEROON
